page.title: 11TURNPIKE CT. ST. GEORGES
page.content:
Turnpike Court is an old folks' home built in St. Georges in 1982. The old folks have their own flats but 2 or 3 can live together if they want. They cook their own food usually, but on Monday they have their dinner together, followed by talks, films or concerts.
There is a big room where they go and talk, play dominoes or cards and drink tea. Sometimes they have coach trips. There is a lift for those who cannot use stairs.
The flats have a little kitchen, bathroom, bedroom and a living room. There is an intercom. If they need help they can call the warden. As well as Turnpike Court there are 200 old folks dwellings connected to the warden's intercom.
